title: Cold weather to ring in New Year as amber health alerts issued
description: Temperatures will fall to lows of -4C in the North West of England, with snow expected in some areas.
content:
The UK Health Security Agency (UKHSA) has issued two amber health alerts for parts of the country as cold weather is set to ring in the new year.

title: Romsey farmers praise 'amazing' support for charity tractor run
description: The 2025 young farmers tractor run saw the convoy travel from Broughton to Romsey.
content:
Thousands of people have gathered to see more than 300 festively decorated tractors on a drive to raise money for charity.
Romsey young farmers tractor run saw the convoy travel from Broughton to Romsey to raise money for Hampshire and Isle of Wight ... [984 chars]

title: Family pay tribute to man who died after assault outside Leicestershire pub
description: David Darke sustained fatal injuries in incident outside the Crown Inn in Appleby Magna, police say
content:
The relatives of a 66-year-old man who died days after being punched outside a village pub have paid tribute to the “devoted family man”.

title: Kate Bush pays tribute to antiques dealer missing after Christmas Day swim
description: Singer, who has known Matthew Upham for 30 years, describes him as ‘extraordinarily kind and thoughtful’
content:
Kate Bush has paid tribute to a “special” antiques dealer who remains missing after a Christmas Day swim in Devon.
The singer said she had been friends with Matthew Upham, 63, for 30 years and that he “lived life to the full”.
